### USAGE ###
>        /api/v1/scheduler
>        /master/api/v1/scheduler

### TL;DR; ###
Endpoint for schedulers to make Calls against the master.

### DESCRIPTION ###
Returns 202 Accepted iff the request is accepted.


### AUTHENTICATION ###
This endpoint does not require authentication.
